name: setup-swig
description: GitHub action to download and setup SWIG

scripts.prepare: npx tsc && npx ncc build build/index.js
scripts.test: mkdir -p install/tmp && RUNNER_TEMP=install/tmp RUNNER_TOOL_CACHE=install INPUT_VERSION=latest INPUT_BRANCH=jse INPUT_CACHE=false INPUT_DEBUG=false ts-node src/index.ts && install/swig/swig-jse -version

author: mmomtchev
